content: It sounds like you may be experiencing tension in your relationship with your dad due to differences in your career aspirations and his expectations for your future. It's understandable to feel frustrated when your passions and goals are not aligned with your parent's expectations. It may be helpful to have an open and honest conversation with your dad about your dreams and how you would like him to support you. Consider expressing your desire to pursue your own path while acknowledging and appreciating the values he has instilled in you. It may take time for your dad to fully understand your perspective, but open communication and actively seeking common ground can help improve your dynamic.
